title: Contact
metaDescription: Contact Harrison Callahan â€” talk through a role or project. Short call, clear next steps, and a reply within a day.
introduction:
# Let's talk shop

I love building cool, performant, and engaging software. If you've got a role or a project in mind, I'm happy to walk through it and see if we're on the same page.

The more info you can share, the better I'll be able to help you. If forms aren't your jam, feel free to reach out using one of the methods below.
